select 연령대,count(연령대) from (select name, case when to_char(sysdate,'yyyy')-to_char(yearofbirth) <= 19 then '10대' when to_char(sysdate,'yyyy')-to_char(yearofbirth) <= 29 then '20대' when to_char(sysdate,'yyyy')-to_char(yearofbirth) <= 39 then '30대' when to_char(sysdate,'yyyy')-to_char(yearofbirth) <= 49 then '40대' when to_char(sysdate,'yyyy')-to_char(yearofbirth) <= 59 then '50대' else '60대 이상' end as 연령대 from reservation r, client_member c where r.userid = c.id and r.res_name=#{value}) group by 연령대 order by 연령대

select * from ( select 국적,count(*),row_number() over(order by count(*) desc) rnum from ( select name, case when nation='AR' then '아르헨티나' when nation='AU' then '호주' when nation='BR' then '브라질' when nation='CA' then '캐나다' when nation='CN' then '중국' when nation='FR' then '프랑스' when nation='DE' then '독일' when nation='IN' then '인도' when nation='ID' then '인도네시아' when nation='IT' then '이탈리아' when nation='JP' then '일본' when nation='KR' then '한국' when nation='MX' then '멕시코' when nation='RU' then '러시아' when nation='SA' then '사우디아라비아' when nation='ZA' then '남아프리카' when nation='TR' then '터키' when nation='GB' then '영국' when nation='US' then '미국' else 'Others' end as 국적 from (select nation,yearofbirth, id, name from reservation r, client_member c where r.userid = c.id and r.res_name=#{value})) group by 국적) where rnum between 1 and 5

select case when 숫자 ='01' then '1월' when 숫자 ='02' then '2월' when 숫자 ='03' then '3월' when 숫자 ='04' then '4월' when 숫자 ='05' then '5월' when 숫자 ='06' then '6월' when 숫자 ='07' then '7월' when 숫자 ='08' then '8월' when 숫자 ='09' then '9월' when 숫자 ='10' then '10월' when 숫자 ='11' then '11월' when 숫자 ='12' then '12월' else '기타 월' end as 월, count(*) from (select res_name,substr(res_date,6,2) 숫자 from reservation where res_name=#{value}) group by 숫자 order by 월

select round(avg(별점),1) star_avg ,round(avg(찜수),1) keep_count,round(avg(조회수),1) view_count from (select d.star_avg 별점,d.keep_count 찜수, d.view_count 조회수 from business b join store d on b.businessname=d.businessname where b.biz_type=#{value})
